exec git init .
exec forge run --platform test ./dir1+test
cmp stdout golden.txt

-- golden.txt --
earthly
--platform
test
./dir1+test
Image ./dir1+test output as test
-- earthly_stdout.txt --
Image ./dir1+test output as test
-- dir1/blueprint.cue --
project: name: "dir1"
-- dir1/Earthfile --
VERSION 0.8

foo:
    RUN echo "foobar"
